description:
Bring Moments to Life with Flipagram™

Create beautiful short video stories using your Facebook, Instagram and Camera Roll photos, set to music you love!

#1 Free App in over 80 countries!

GET FEATURED Use #flipagram when posting to have a chance to get featured on the @flipagram official account!

Create your Flipagram in 3 easy steps:
1. Select - Moments / photos from camera roll, albums, Facebook or Instagram.
2. Create - Sort Moments, Choose Title, Select Music or Record Narration, and Set Timing
3. Share - #flipagram on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Vine, Tumblr, Email, Text, Pinterest, WhatsApp, or LINE!

FEATURES
Give life to your best photo moments
+ sitting on your phone
+ laying flat on Instagram
+ or hiding out in Facebook albums

Photo Booth
+ create selfie parties of you and your friends!

Stop Motion Camera
+ create time-lapses or animations!

Choose the perfect music
+ Your music library
+ from millions of song previews for free
+ or buy full songs

Voice Recorder
+ Narrate your Flipagrams to tell a great story with your photos!

Set the right timing & speed
+ Instagram (15 seconds)
+ Flipagram (30 seconds)
+ Time per flip to make a flipagram of any length

Set your title or add text to any photo
+ Set font, color, size, location

Instant Preview
+To check timing and your edits

Share your #flipagram photo story
+ with the world
+ or with anyone you choose!

SHARING FEATURES
+ Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Vine, Tumblr, Pinterest, Whats App, or LINE
+ Email, SMS, or via Public Link
+ Save to Camera Roll
releaseNotes:
Hi - we're back with some major bug fixes!
- Fixed crashes when creating a Flipagram
- Fixed issues when connecting to Facebook
- Fixed an issue when sharing to Instagram
- Fixed an issue when changing the speed of a Flipagram
- Added better language support for our Portuguese speaking friends


New in 3.5:

Flipagram Accounts Are Here - Save to your profile & edit your Flipagrams!

- Free up space on your phone and never lose your creations with Flipagrams auto-saved to your profile.
- Edit Flipagrams: You can now edit your latest creation to make sure it's perfect.
